body: @amihaiemil please pay attention to this new issue.

issue.title: Implement reactions API?

repository.name: jcabi-github
repository.description: Java Object-Oriented Wrapper of GitHub API, with a fake implementation of the entire GitHub API (for your tests)

issue.body:
Github recently introduced Reactions API. We could start implementing it.

https://developer.github.com/v3/reactions/#list-reactions-for-a-commit-comment

issue.title: Reaction.java:39-42: Implement Reactions to Comments and...

repository.name: jcabi-github
repository.description: Java Object-Oriented Wrapper of GitHub API, with a fake implementation of the entire GitHub API (for your tests)

issue.body:
The puzzle `1230-92aa948b` from #1230 has to be resolved: 

https://github.com/jcabi/jcabi-github/blob/c736f37bca18f14c94f7ac618fef88cfd3c5ab62/src/main/java/com/jcabi/github/Reaction.java#L39-L42

The puzzle was created by Paulo Lobo on 07-Dec-18. 

  

If you have any technical questions, don't ask me, submit new tickets instead. The task will be \"done\" when the problem is fixed and the text of the puzzle is _removed_ from the source code. Here is more about [PDD](http://www.yegor256.com/2009/03/04/pdd.html) and [about me](http://www.yegor256.com/2017/04/05/pdd-in-action.html).
